model.name: Largest Rectangle
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin", "r");
function largestRectangle($h) {
    // Complete this function
}

fscanf($handle, "%i",$n);
$h_temp = fgets($handle);
$h = explode(" ",$h_temp);
$h = array_map('intval', $h);
$result = largestRectangle($h);
echo $result . "\n";

?>
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

def largestRectangle(h)
    # Complete this function
end

n = gets.strip.to_i
h = gets.strip
h = h.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
result = largestRectangle(h)
puts result
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    n_temp <- getLine
    let n = read n_temp :: Int
    h_temp <- getLine
    let h = map read $ words h_temp :: [Int]

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Given n buildings, find the largest rectangular area possible by joining consecutive K buildings.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
    let [
      n_t (read-line) 
      n (Integer/parseInt n_t) 
    ]

  (
    let [
      h_temp (read-line) 
      h_t (split h_temp #"\s+") 
      h (map #(Integer/parseInt %) h_t) 
    ]
  )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [N]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    H = read_array(N,"~d"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
function largestRectangle(h)
    -- Complete this function

n = io.read("*number", "*l")
h = {}
h_temp = io.read()
h_i = 1
for token in string.gmatch(h_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	h[h_i] = token
	h_i = h_i + 1
end
